org.corfudb.runtime.smr

Interface ICorfuDBObject<U>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CDBArrayList, CDBConcurrentSkipListMap, CDBCounter, CDBLogicalOrderedMap, CDBSimpleMap, LambdaLogicalBTree, LPBTEntry, LPBTNode, LPBTree

    public interface ICorfuDBObject<U>
extends Serializable
    Created by mwei on 5/1/15.

      • getSMREngine

        Returns the SMR engine associated with this object.

        default Class<U> getUnderlyingType()
        Get the type of the underlying object

        default UUID getStreamID()
        Get the UUID of the underlying stream

      • setStreamID

        default void setStreamID(UUID streamID)
        Set the stream ID
        Parameters:
        streamID - The stream ID to set.

      • getUnderlyingSMREngine

        default ISMREngine<U> getUnderlyingSMREngine()
        Get underlying SMR engine
        Returns:
        The SMR engine this object was instantiated under.

      • setUnderlyingSMREngine

        default void setUnderlyingSMREngine(ISMREngine<U> engine)
        Set underlying SMR engine
        Parameters:
        smrEngine - The SMR engine to replace.

      • getUnderlyingTransaction

        default ITransaction getUnderlyingTransaction()
        Get the underlying transaction
        Returns:
        The transaction this object is currently participating in.

      • accessorHelper

        default <R> R accessorHelper(ISMREngineCommand<U,R> command)
        Must be called whenever the object is accessed, in order to ensure that every write is read.

      • mutatorHelper

        default void mutatorHelper(IConsumerOnlySMREngineCommand<U> command)
        Called whenever an object is to be mutated with the command that will be executed.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to be executed.

      • mutatorAccessorHelper

        default <R> R mutatorAccessorHelper(ISMREngineCommand<U,R> command)
        Called whenever and object will be both mutated and accessed.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to be executed.
        Returns:
        The result of the access.

      • localCommandHelper

        default <R> R localCommandHelper(ISMRLocalCommand<U,R> command)
        Called whenever a local command is to be proposed. A local command is a command which is processed only at the local client, but may generate results which insert commands into the log.
        Parameters:
        command - The local command to be executed.
        Returns:
        True, if the command succeeds. False otherwise.

      • setInstance

        default void setInstance(ICorfuDBInstance instance)

      • getInstance

        default ICorfuDBInstance getInstance()

      • isAutomaticallyPlayedBack

        default boolean isAutomaticallyPlayedBack()
        Whether or not the object has been registered for automatic playback.
        Returns:
        True if the object is being automatically played back, False otherwise.

      • generateCheckpoint

        default ITimestamp generateCheckpoint()
        Manually generate a checkpoint and insert it into the log.
        Returns:
        The timestamp the checkpoint was generated and proposed.

      • preMutationHandler

        default void preMutationHandler(ITimestamp timestamp,
                                U object)
        Triggered before an object is mutated.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - The timestamp of the state change triggering the handler.
        object - The state of the object before the mutation.

      • postMutationHandler

        default void postMutationHandler(ITimestamp timestamp,
                                 U object)
        Triggered after an object is mutated.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - The timestamp of the object after triggering the handler
        object - The state of the object after the mutation.
